= Introduction =

Using mocca as a GUI for EMC2:

1.) Get mocca compiled (see wiki comiling mocca)
2.) Add a symbilic link in (YOURPATHTOEMC)/bin: ln -s /home/yourname/mocca/bin/mocca mocca
3.) make mocca executeable
3.) edit your config- file
4.) set DISPLAY = mocca in your config- file
5.) start emc using the ini- file mentioned above
